title: How to change Capitalization in summoner name?
body: My name is Pax Sivir and I want to change it to PAX Sivir but Riot doesn't let me... so how do I do it? @rito pls

replies.body:
You can request case changes to your summoner name by writing in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), just be sure to specify exactly what you want to be done, as you did here.

Let me know if you have any questions.
